item.title: Restock Shops Command
item.dc:creator: @sinzscapeserver sinzscapeserver
item.description:
@sinzscapeserver wrote:

What this basically does is restock all the shops to the Amount set on the shops configuration file
Example
Out of stock Fire Rune
After command reload shops
In stock fire rune

Add this Command

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("reloadshops") && playerRights > 2) { server.shopHandler.reloadshops(); sM("Shops Reloaded"); }

Then Add this method into ShopHandler Class

public void reloadshops() { for (int i = 0; i < MaxShops; i++) { for (int j = 0; j < MaxShopItems; j++) { ResetItem(i, j); ShopItemsSN[i][j] = 0; // Special resetting, only at begin ! } ShopItemsStandard[i] = 0; // Special resetting, only at begin ! ShopSModifier[i] = 0; ShopBModifier[i] = 0; ShopName[i] = ""; } TotalShops = 0; loadShops("shops.cfg"); }

Read full topic
